oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1947-08-16 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 16, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Riley Shepard (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Jack Beasley; Thomas Family Trio; Riley Shepard; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Riley Shepard and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (2:42) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (3:33) Riley Shepard introduces the next song / (3:44) Jack Beasley and the Thomas Family Trio perform "You Can’t Break The Chains Of Love" / (6:06) Riley Shepard performs "If You’re The Sweetheart Of Somebody Else (Don’t Pal Around With Me)" [unconfirmed] / (8:19) The Thomas Family Trio performs "Nearer My God To Thee" / (10:56) Chuck Davis performs closing theme / (11:21) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Beasley, Jack; Shepard, Riley; Davis, Chuck;
